Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a method
Improvements.Description: The code inside the retry method is almost the same in both calls. It's better to extract this into a method which can be called with parameters.

Improvements.Improvement: Use constants for repeated string literals
Improvements.Description: The string literals 'clamav-status', 'clean', 'infected' are used multiple times in the code. It's a good practice to define such literals as constants.
